title: AML Resource Schema
description: Schema for AML resources (alert, case, transaction, customer, sar) in AML PoC

owner_user_id.description: User ID of the case owner (for case resources)

status.description: Resource status (e.g., 'open', 'closed' for cases; 'new', 'triaged', 'escalated', 'closed' for alerts)

case_id.description: Case ID (for case_note and sar resources)
